summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 170 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 888 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 169.8m lower than yesterday, 12.9m lower than the past week, 887.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1816.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Some rain can be expected, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Changeable conditions.
